text: Developed a distributed microservices backend using Golang and gRPC, achieving 99.9% uptime and supporting over 10 million daily requests.
Deployed and managed Kubernetes clusters for staging and production environments, ensuring seamless CI/CD integration and blue-green releases.
Built RESTful and gRPC APIs for internal services, including authentication, task scheduling, and data ingestion modules.
Implemented monitoring and logging solutions using Prometheus and Grafana to improve system observability and reliability.
Collaborated with product managers and frontend engineers to deliver scalable features under Agile development practices.
Designed a message queue architecture using Kafka and Redis Stream to decouple services and improve throughput under high concurrency.
Proficient in Golang, Docker, Kubernetes, MySQL, Redis, and Git; experienced in cloud-native backend system development.
Job Requirement: Strong experience with Go or Java backend development; familiarity with container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.
Job Requirement: Ability to design and implement high-concurrency systems, optimize service latency, and handle distributed transactions.
Job Requirement: Knowledge of microservices, API gateway, service mesh (e.g., Istio), and gRPC-based service-to-service communication.
